name: Gavin Free
desc: Very silly English guy who created the Slo Mo Guys

name: Javi Santana
desc: My boss in CartoDB, "the smartest guy in geo you haven't heard of (yet)"

name: Derek Sivers
desc: Musician who founded the biggest online indie music store, sold it for $22M, and donated it all to a music teaching trust fund.

name: Lyzi Diamond
desc: Programmer with a passion for what I hate the most about code: documenting.

name: Javier Arce
desc: Coworker and friend. His website is one of my favourite places on the internet.
